00040 function ImportCSV($p_cn,$file,$p_bq_account,$p_format_csv,$p_jrn)
00041 {
00042         if(!$handle = fopen($file, "r")) {
00043                 print 'could not open file. quitting';
00044                 die;
00045         }
00046 
00047 StartSql($p_cn);
00048 
00049         
00050 // include the right format for CSV --> given by the <form
00051                 include($p_format_csv);
00052 
00053         
00054         echo "Importation terminée.";
00055 
00056 // if importation succeeds then we can commit the change
00057 Commit($p_cn);
00058 
00059 }
00063 function UpdateCSV($p_cn, $code, $poste){
00064         $sql = "update import_tmp set poste_comptable='".$poste."' where code='".$code."'";
00065         $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00066 }
00070 function VerifImport($p_cn){
00071         $sql = "select * from import_tmp where poste_comptable='' or poste_comptable is null";
00072         $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00073         $Num=pg_NumRows($Res);
00074         echo $Num." opérations à complèter.<br/><br/>";
00075         $i=1;
00076         // include javascript for popup 
00077         echo JS_SEARCH_CARD;
00078         while($val = pg_fetch_array($Res)){
00079           $w=new widget('js_search_only');
00080           $w->name='code';
00081           $w->extra='cred';
00082           $w->extra2=$val['jrn'];
00083           $w->label='';
00084           $w->table=0;
00085 
00086           $s=new widget('span');
00087 
00088                 echo '<form METHOD="POST" action="import.php?action=verif">';
00089                 echo '<input type="hidden" name="code" value="'.$val['code'].'">';
00090                 
00091                 echo '<table border="1" width="500">';
00092                 echo '<tr><td width="200">'.$val['code'].'</td><td width="200">'.$val['date_exec'].'</td><td width="100">'.$val['montant'].' EUR</td><tr/>';
00093                 echo '<tr><td height="50" colspan="3">'.$val['detail'].'</td><tr/>';
00094                 //echo '<tr><td>Poste Comptable : <input type="text" size="10" name="poste"></td>';
00095                 echo '<tr><td>'.$w->IOValue().'</td>'.$s->IOValue('code_label').'</td></TR>';
00096                 echo "<td>n° compte : ".$val['num_compte']."</td>";
00097                 echo '<td><input type="submit" value="modifier"></td><tr/>';
00098                 echo '</table>';
00099                 echo '</FORM>';
00100                 $i++;
00101         }
00102 }
00108 function TransferCSV($p_cn, $periode){
00109         //on obtient la période courante
00110   $User=new cl_user($p_cn);
00111   $periode = $User->GetPeriode();
00112   // on trouve les dates frontières de cette période
00113   $sql = "select to_char(p_start,'DD-MM-YYYY') as p_start,to_char(p_end,'DD-MM-YYYY') as p_end".
00114     " from parm_periode where p_id = '".$periode."'";
00115   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00116   $val = pg_fetch_array($Res);
00117   if ( $val == false )
00118     {
00119       echo "<script>".
00120         "alert ('Vous devez selectionner votre période dans vos préférences');".
00121         "</script>";
00122       exit();
00123     }
00124   $start ="to_date('".$val['p_start']."','DD-MM-YYYY')";   
00125   $end = "to_date('".$val['p_end']."','DD-MM-YYYY')";
00126   var_dump($val);
00127   $sql = "select * from import_tmp where poste_comptable is not null and  poste_comptable <> '' 
00128           and   ok <> TRUE AND date_exec BETWEEN ".$start." and ".$end;
00129   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00130   //echo "boucle: ".sizeof($Res)."<br/>";
00131   //while($val = pg_fetch_array($Res)){
00132   $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00133   echo $Max." opérations à transférer.<br/>";
00134   for ($i = 0;$i < $Max;$i++) {
00135     $val=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00136     
00137     $code=$val['code']; $date_exec=$val['date_exec']; $montant=$val['montant']; $num_compte=$val['num_compte']; 
00138     $poste_comptable=$val['poste_comptable'];$bq_account=$val['bq_account'];
00139     $jrn=$val['jrn'];
00140     
00141     list($annee, $mois, $jour) = explode("-", $date_exec);
00142     $date_exec = $jour.".".$mois.".".$annee;
00143     
00144     // Vérification que le poste comptable trouvé existe
00145     $sqltest = "select * from tmp_pcmn WHERE pcm_val='".$poste_comptable."'";
00146     $Restest=ExecSql($p_cn,$sqltest);
00147     $test=pg_NumRows($Restest);
00148     if($test == 0) {
00149       $sqlupdate = "update import_tmp set poste_comptable='' WHERE code='".$code."' AND num_compte='".$num_compte."'";
00150       $Resupdate=ExecSql($p_cn,$sqlupdate);
00151       echo "Poste comptable erronné pour l'opération ".$num_compte."-".$code.", réinitialisation du poste comptable<br/>";
00152     } else {
00153       
00154       // Finances
00155       
00156       //$seq = GetNextId($p_cn,'j_grpt')+1;
00157       $seq=NextSequence($p_cn,'s_grpt');
00158       $p_user = $_SESSION['g_user'];
00159       //$periode = GetUserPeriode($p_cn,$p_user);
00160       //$periode = $User->GetPeriode();
00161       StartSql($p_cn);
00162 
00163       $r=InsertJrnx($p_cn,"d",$p_user,$jrn,$bq_account,$date_exec,$montant,$seq,$periode);
00164       if ( $r == false) { $Rollback($p_cn);exit("error 'import_inc.php' __LINE__");}
00165       
00166       $r=InsertJrnx($p_cn,"c",$p_user,$jrn,$poste_comptable,$date_exec,$montant,$seq,$periode);
00167       if ( $r == false) { $Rollback($p_cn);exit("error 'import_inc.php' __LINE__");}
00168       
00169       //remove annoying double-quote
00170       $num_compte=str_replace('"','',$num_compte);
00171       $code=str_replace('\"','',$code);
00172       if ( strlen(trim($num_compte)) == 0 )
00173         $num_compte=$val['detail'];
00174 
00175       $r=InsertJrn($p_cn,$date_exec,NULL,$jrn,$num_compte." ".$code,$montant,$seq,$periode);
00176       if ( $r == false ) { Rollback($p_cn); exit(" Error 'import_inc.php' __LINE__");}
00177       
00178       //$sql = "insert into jrn (jr_def_id,jr_montant,jr_comment,jr_date,jr_grpt_id,jr_tech_per) values ( ".$p_jrn.", abs(".round($montant,2)."), '".$num_compte." ".$code."','".$date_valeur."','".$seq."','".$periode."')";
00179       SetInternalCode($p_cn,$seq,$jrn);
00180       
00181       
00182       echo "Tranfer de l'opération ".$code." effectué<br/>";
00183       $sql2 = "update import_tmp set ok=TRUE where code='".$code."'";
00184       $Res2=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql2);
00185       
00186       Commit($p_cn);
00187     }
00188   }
00189 }
00200 function ShowFormTransfert($p_cn){
00201 $w=new widget("select");
00202   echo '<FORM METHOD="POST" action="import.php?action=import" enctype="multipart/form-data">';
00203   echo '<INPUT TYPE="file" name="fupload" size="20"><br>';
00204   // ask for the journal target 
00205   $jrn=make_array ($p_cn,"select jrn_def_id,jrn_def_name from jrn_def where jrn_def_type='FIN';");
00206   $w->label='Journal';
00207   echo $w->label." :".$w->IOValue('import_jrn',$jrn)."<br>";
00208   // choose the bank account
00209   $bq=make_array($p_cn,"select pcm_val,pcm_lib from tmp_pcmn where pcm_val like '550%'");
00210   $w->label='Banque';
00211   echo "Compte en banque :".$w->IOValue('import_bq',$bq)."<br>";
00212   $format_csv=make_array($p_cn,"select include_file,name from format_csv_banque;");
00213   $w->label="Format import";
00214   echo $w->label.$w->IOValue('format_csv',$format_csv).'<br>';
00215   echo '<INPUT TYPE="SUBMIT" Value="Import fiche">';
00216   echo '</FORM>';
00217 }
